text: I am trying to reference a file in a directory in a serverless func for a CRM Card but it doesn't find it; i'm guessing its because the structure it gets uploaded to in HubSpot is different than the local version. If I log the dirname, I get "/var/task/" but obviously that doesn't correspond to the local version. anyone know how to get files into that folder?
Is there anyway around the 20s time limit?
Weird the docs say 10s, but mine last 20s
I think custom code workflows are 10s so maybe thatâ€™s the confusion
Re: working around the time limit. Idts. I ran into this with custom workflows and was able to use chatgpt to make my code more efficient to shave off some time.
